resources.string: The request has been understood but has been refused due to incompatible client version.
Some of our web site features are unavailable at this time. We sincerely apologize for this temporary inconvenience and are working to resolve the issue.
We will be performing a system maintenance between 1 a.m. and 6 a.m. Eastern Time. We apologize for any inconvenience. Please try again later, or for immediate assistance call 1–877–742–7822.
At this time, only the primary cardholder can register for and access Account Center. For more assistance, please contact Customer Service at 1–877–742–7822.

We\'re sorry. We are currently updating our system and cannot complete your request at this time. We apologize for any inconvenience. Please try again later or, for immediate assistance call 1–800–347–2683.

We know you’re excited to get into the app, but you’ve tried to log in with the wrong username or password too many times. For more information, please contact Customer Service at 1–800–Discover (1–800–347–4996) for assistance.
To protect the security of your Account, we do not save your Discover card Account number with the "Remember My User ID" feature. It is only available when you use a user ID to log in.
You have one more log in attempt today. For security purposes, we limit the number of attempts to enter your information. If you think you are receiving this message in error, call 1–877–742–7822.
Help us keep your account safe by visiting Discover.com on your primary PC to establish your set of security questions.

Due to special conditions related to your account, we cannot provide you with access to Discover.com Mobile at this time. Please contact customer service at 1–877–742–7822 for more information or assistance.

We\'re sorry, you may no longer use this Discover card account number to access Discover.com Mobile. Instead, please visit www.discover.com to create a User ID and password. If you have any questions, please contact Customer Service at 1–877–742–7822 .
Your online access is still being set up. Please try back again later.

Your Discover Card Account Number has been changed. In order to access your account through the mobile channel, you must first log in to the Account Center on www.discover.com. For more information, please contact Customer Service at 1–877–742–7822
The information you provided does not match our records, or you are not registered for the Account Center.
Your request cannot be completed at this time. We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience and are working to resolve this issue soon. For further assistance please call 1–877–742–7822
We\'re sorry. We can\'t complete your request at this time. Please contact us for more information.

We\'re sorry. Our services are unavailable at this time.
We apologize for any inconvenience.
We\'re sorry. We can\'t complete your request to log into your Discover Bank Account at this time. You will be directed to your Discover Card Home Screen.
Your Request Could Not Be Completed
Sorry. The User ID and/or Password does not match our records, or you are not registered. Please try again.
The request has been understood but has been refused due to incompatible client version.

Discover.com Mobile Error

We\'re sorry. Your request cannot be completed at this time. We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience and are working to resolve this issue soon. For further assistance please call 1-877-742-7822

We\'re sorry. Our services are unavailable at this time.
We apologize for any inconvenience.
We\'re sorry. The Credit Card Account Number and/or Password does not match our records, or you are not registered. Please try again.
Your Request Could Not Be Completed
Unknown error with the server, please try again later.
Thank you for using Discover mobile.
There was a problem authenticating your registration information.
The answer does not match your Account information.
Some of our website features are unavailable at this time. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and are working to resolve the issue. Please contact us for more information.
Open up a Discover Bank Account and enjoy competitive online banking rates. You can earn and manage your money right from your mobile device.
The page you are about to view is not optimized for mobile devices. Tap Continue to view this page on discover.com
